page.title: 11 Beccles B.R.S.Depot.
page.content: During 1948 2 local firms were amalgamated and nationalised to form the British Road Services Depot,London Rd.They have 22 lorries of 38 ton units each carrying 23-24 tons.The trailer alone is 40 feet long.This kind of lorry has 5 axles,2 on the unit and 3 on the trailer.A unit may do about 100,000 miles in 6 months.Drivers can work 8 hour shifts and are often away all over the country for up to 5 nights and have to sleep in their cabs. In the depot they have 32,000 cubic feet of warehouse space containing pallets,each holding about 2,880 tins. To check the food quality samples are taken from 12 tins on a pallet but all are disposed of after 2 years. An average load carried is 20 pallets or 57,600 tins.The tins hold anything from cat food to garden peas.
